title: Journalists will start asking the right questions
description: When I talk to journalists, including ones just entering the field, many say the same thing about why they got into the business: “I want to tell stories.” If that is the case, I can recommend a nice MFA program. But journalism? Journalism is something different entirely. We are here to serve, not to be...
